QuestData.Title: Warn Stoneplow
QuestData.Description: So much death. And more to come, if Ambassador Han's stories of the mantid are to be believed.$b$bWe must help. We must do our part to save lives.$b$bTravel to Stoneplow. Warn them of the coming mantid attack.$b$bI will join you with what forces I can muster once I have laid Kor's body to rest.
QuestData.LogDescription: Travel to Stoneplow Village in Valley of the Four Winds.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Travel to Stoneplow in the Valley of the Four Winds.
